BPI.errorGeneric:
Unfortunately we are unable to register you for the program at this time.  

We have your contact details and one of our Customer Support Team will contact you shortly to resolve the issue and help with registration.

Many thanks.
BPI.invalidSiret: A valid 14 digit code is required
BPI.msgAbort:
By using this option you will lose any of the information that you have already completed.  

Are you sure that you want to cancel?
BPI.msgNeedHelp: Would us to contact you and discuss your eligibility, or any other aspect of registration?

core.msgDataChange:
Thank you.  

We have received your change request and this will be reviewed by the curation
team and updated accordingly.  

Please be aware that you may not see any changes for up to 24 hours.

spw.headerContentRequired: We need a bit more content
spw.msgContentRequired:
Good work so far but we need a bit more information to generate your Single Page Website (SPW). 

The summary below should indicate which sections still need additional content. Once you've added enough data, the **PREVIEW** and **PUBLISH** options will be enabled and we can create your SPW and distribute your content to our partners.

You can [view a demo restaurant version]({{ link }}) top see what the SPW will look like with content added.
spw.msgPublished: Your **SPW** has been successfully published and has been synchronised with all Restaurant Collective content subscribers. You can view your page or copy the URL using the MARKETING LINK options below.
spw.msgUnpublished:
The latest changes that you have made have not yet been published. 

**PREVIEW** your SPW to check and verify your content. If everything is correct then press **PUBLISH** to synchronise with all {{ brand }} distribution channels.
spw.msgVerified: Verified and published on {{ date }} by {{ name }}.

summary.statusMenus: {{ pdf }} active pdf menus & {{ dish }} sample dishes

FEATURES.labelDescFull: A full description up to {{ chars }} characters max.
FEATURES.labelDescParagraph: A one paragraph description, 200 characters max.
FEATURES.labelDescSentence: A one sentence description {{ chars }} characters max.
FEATURES.labelStrapline: Strapline (e.g. Restaurant & Bar) {{ chars }} characters maximum
FEATURES.tipAddFeatures: Add extra features here, separated by commas

HOURS.labelGeneral: Add general information about you opening times ({{ chars }} characters max)

IMAGES.msgConfirmDelete: You are about to delete **image {{ img }}**,  are you sure that you want to do that?
IMAGES.msgDefaultUpdated: The default image has been successfully updated
IMAGES.msgDeleted: Image {{ img }} has now been deleted

LINKS.infoCustomDomain:
The **SPW** can also be set up to work on a custom domain (e.g. www.your-domain.com). 

It can be an existing domain name, or we can register a suitable domain name for you. Contact the [Curation Team](mailto:{{ email }}) for further details.
LINKS.infoQRCodes:
**QR Codes** are special images that carry information about a website location. 

Most modern smartphone or tablet devices will recognise and decode these images, via their camera apps, and provide an option to visit the relevant web page directly.
LINKS.infoSpwLink:
The website link, or URL, above is a permanent link to the Single Page Website or **SPW** that is automatically generated by **Restaurant Collective**. 

This link can be shared with customers or partners via any digital medium.
LINKS.infoUsage:
Use these links in any 'offline' situation to provide an easy way for your customers to access the website, or menus, on their smartphone or tablet. 

You can copy the QR code to your computer using right-click or long-press on the image.
LINKS.tipQRCodeMenu: Download the MENU QR Code for {{ name }} which links users to the SPW Menu section.
LINKS.tipQRCodeWebsite: Download the QR Code for {{ name }} which links users to the SPW

LOCATION.infoDirectionsDownload: If you have a PDF map, or directions then you can make it available to your customers by uploading a copy here.

LOCATION.labelPublicTransport: Trains, buses, stations etc.({{ chars }} characters max.)
LOCATION.msgNewCoords: Coordinates updated to latitude: {{ lat }} and longitude {{ lng }}.

MENUS.hintSection: For example Starters, Main Course or Lunch etc.
MENUS.infoSampleDishes:
Add a selection of your most popular dishes. We would recommend that you choose a cross-section of your price range and dishes that best reflect your style of food. You can display the dishes as 
![Vegetarian]({{ icon.veg }}) **Vegetarian**, 
![Vegan]({{ icon.vegan }}) **Vegan** or 
![Gluten Free]({{ icon.gluten }}) **Gluten Free** when you add them.
MENUS.labelMenuGenInfo: Add any general information about the menus ({{ max }} characters max.)
MENUS.msgConfirmDeleteMenu: You are about to delete the PDF menu **{{ item }}** – are you sure that's what you want to do?
MENUS.msgRemoveFromMenu: You are about to delete **{{ item }}** from the menu, is that what you want to do?

RESERVATIONS.labelGroupPolicy: What is your policy regarding group bookings (max. {{ max }} characters)?
RESERVATIONS.labelPrivate: Do you offer any private dining options (max. {{ max }} characters) ?
RESERVATIONS.msgNoOnlineBookings: Please ensure that you complete the **General** information section, giving details of how customers can book in advance, outlining your policy regarding reservations and including any special telephone numbers etc.
RESERVATIONS.msgNoTest: This service does not require testing - it does not have an associated URL

UPLOAD.errorExceedsMax: That file exceeds the maximum size that can be uploaded.
UPLOAD.infoImages: Images must be .jpg or .jpeg files and not exceed 5mb in size. Landscape format (i.e. wider than they are tall) will work best.

ERRORS.failedToSendVerificationEmail: We were unable send your verification email at this time. Please try again in a few moments. Our support team have been notified.
ERRORS.failedToSetSession: We were unable to store some cookies in your browser, so we are unable to log you in at this time. Please try again in a few moments. Our support team have been notified.
ERRORS.failedToUpdateRestaurantEmail: We were unable to update the email for your restaurant at this time. Please try again in a few moments. Our support team have been notified.
ERRORS.invalidServerResponse: Our server returned an error, so we are unable to log you in at this time. Please try again in a few moments. Our support team have been notified.
ERRORS.noServerResponse: Our server has stopped responding, so we are unable to log you in at this time. Your internet connection looks stable, so please try again in a few moments. Our support team have been notified.
ERRORS.unableToAddAssociation: We were unable to associate your restaurant at this time. Please try again in a few moments. Our support team have been notified.

JOIN.infoPrereg:
# Bienvenue, et merci pour l’intérêt que vous portez à notre programme d’accompagnement gratuit “Mise en place numérique” !

Les détails concernant les 3 parcours seront bientôt disponibles. En attendant, laissez-nous vos coordonnées pour être recontacté dès que les inscriptions seront ouvertes :
JOIN.infoSignUp:
# Bienvenue et merci pour l'intérêt que vous portez à Mise en place numérique !

Cet accompagnement est **gratuit** pour vous, car **entièrement financé par Bpifrance** dans le cadre du plan France Relance.

Pour pouvoir en bénéficier, Bpifrance nous demande de vérifier que les participants répondent à des **critères d’éligibilité** précis.

Merci de bien vouloir renseigner les informations demandées (promis, ça ne prend que 2 minutes !) afin que Restaurateurs Indépendants puisse les transmettre à Bpifrance pour valider votre inscription.

Une fois ce formulaire rempli, nous vous invitons **à réserver tout de suite votre premier rendez-vous individuel** à distance avec l’un de nos conseillers, en fonction de vos disponibilités. Cette étape permettra de faire le point sur vos besoins et vos attentes, et de débuter l’accompagnement dans les meilleures conditions.

À très bientôt !

# Ok thanks!

A member of our Support & Curation Team will be in contact with you shortly.

**{{ brand }} Curation Team**
JOIN.joinUsByReferral:
# Welcome

You've been invited to become a member of **{{ brand }}**, an organisation that has been created to support restaurants, and affect positives change within the industry. 

Please enter your contact details and indicate that you accept our terms.

If you experience any problems activating your membership then do please [contact our Support Team]({{ email }}).
JOIN.joinUsByReferralFree:
# Free Membership!

You've been invited to become a free member of **{{ brand }}**, an organisation that has been created to support restaurants, and affect positives change within the industry. 

Please enter your contact details and indicate that you accept our terms.

If you experience any problems activating your membership then do please [contact our Support Team]({{ email }}).

Still unsure? [Visit our website for more information](https://restaurantcollective.org.uk/first-3-months-membership-is-absolutely-free/)
JOIN.joinUsToday:
# Subscribe Now

Just complete the following steps and we’ll have you signed up in no time. 

 1. Provide your name and contact details

 2. Choose a subscription option

 3. Pay online.

If you experience any problems throughout this process please email: 

{{ email }}
JOIN.joinWelcome:
# Welcome

You've successfully registered yourself as a **Member** and we've sent you login details and along with some further information.

Close this window and check your email.

Many thanks.

**{{ brand }} Curation Team**
JOIN.labelGDPR: Ces données nous permettront de vous informer dès que les inscriptions à Mise en place numérique seront ouvertes. Elles ne seront pas transmises à des tiers dans un but commercial. Vous pouvez vous désinscrire à tout moment en écrivant à info@restaurateursindependants.fr
JOIN.labelReferrer: Comment j’ai connu Mise en place numérique
JOIN.labelTerms: By ticking this box you agree to the {{ brand }} Terms and Privacy Policy and for **{{ brand }}** to contact you, when necessary, using the details that you have provided here.
JOIN.msgCheckEmail: Check your email for sign in credentials
JOIN.msgManditory: Please complete all of the information.
JOIN.msgThanks: Merci de votre confiance, nous allons vous recontacter très prochainement !

MEMBERSHIP.infoMembershipMonthly:
##  MONTHLY SUBSCRIPTION

Pay just **{{ fee }}** per month for full access to all the benefits offered by **{{ brand }}** Membership.
MEMBERSHIP.infoMembershipYearly:
## ANNUAL SUBSCRIPTION

Pay **{{ fee }}** per year and you'll get a full 12 month membership for the price of only 10. All the same **{{ brand }}** benefits, just a bit cheaper!
MEMBERSHIP.instructions:
# What do I get?

- Power over your online presence with our content management tool and included single page website

- Economies of scale and vetted suppliers in our Deals Marketplace

- Advice and support from fellow indies in our Members Forum

# And soon...

- Mentorship from people who have been where they are now

- Great staff on loan/recommendation via the Restaurant Collective Job Exchange

- Skills training for themselves and their teams in our Knowledge Base

- Inclusion in the UK’s largest directory of independent restaurants
MEMBERSHIP.msgInvalidStripe: There seems to be a problem with your details. Please use the 'back' button to go back and check your details, or to contact support.
MEMBERSHIP.terms: Please take the time to read the [Terms of Membership]({{ terms }}) and [Privacy Policy]({{ privacy }}). By becoming a member of Restaurant Collective you are confirming your acceptance of these terms.

MESSAGES.welcomeNewMember:
# You're in!

It's great that you've chosen to join Restaurant Collective and we hope that you'll help us to grow this exciting community of industry professionals and independent restaurateurs.

## Add your restaurant

Before you start exploring the Member's Hub, please complete the initial set up by linking your restaurant to your membership account.

When you're ready, select the **START HERE** option below.

Find your restaurant and follow the on-screen instructions to verify the details and link it to your Membership.

PLANS.infoCurrentPlanMonthly: Your current membership plan renews on the **{{ renewal }}** of each month at **{{ price }}**. To change your plan, select another option below and we'll calculate any additional charges due.
PLANS.infoCurrentPlanYearly: Your current membership plan renews on the **{{ renewal }}** at a total of **{{ price }}**. To change your plan, select another option below and we'll calculate any additional charges due.
PLANS.infoDowngrading: If you choose to go ahead and change your membership plan to **{{ plan }}** then we’ll credit your account with the difference in subscription fees for this period and from **{{ renewal }}** your new payment will be **{{ price }}**.
PLANS.infoNewPlanMonthly: If you choose to go ahead and change your membership plan to **{{ plan }}** then we’ll charge you **{{ prorate }}** now – which is prorated for the current billing period – and from **{{ renewal }}** your new monthly subscription will be **{{ price }}**.
PLANS.infoNewPlanYearly: If you choose to change your membership plan to **{{ plan }}** then we’ll charge you **{{ prorate }}** now –  which is prorated for the current billing period – and from **{{ renewal }}** we’ll bill you at the new yearly subscription fee of **{{ price }}**.
PLANS.msgAddRestaurant: Begin managing your web content and publishing your **Single Page Website** that's included with your Membership plan.

SETTINGS.infoAccounts:
Restaurants that are linked to your account are shown below and you can manage additional restaurants by simply adding them here.

To view your billing history and payment details, or to download your invoices, select the 'MANAGE PAYMENTS' option above.
SETTINGS.infoAuth: These are the credentials that you'll need to Sign In to the application. Passwords must be at least 8 characters.
SETTINGS.infoAvatar: Click the image add/edit and personalise your account details.
SETTINGS.infoMember: All communications regarding your account will be sent to this email address.
SETTINGS.infoNotification: In addition to essential communications about your {{ brand }}  Membership, you may also choose receive any of the following, by ticking the relevant checkbox:
SETTINGS.infoReferrals: This is a unique referral code that you can share with any of your colleagues, to encourage them to join RDL and be part of this exciting new organisation.
SETTINGS.labelAddRestaurant: Add a restaurant to this account
SETTINGS.msgAddRestaurant_m:
Adding another restaurant will increase your membership subscription by **{{ price }}**. 

We'll calculate any additional prorated fees that would be due in this month and charge that to your account automatically – once you've successfully added your restaurant.

After that, your subscription charge will be **{{ total }}** every month. Would you like to go ahead and add a restaurant?
SETTINGS.msgAddRestaurant_y:
Adding another restaurant will increase your membership subscription by **{{ price }}** a year.

We'll calculate any additional prorated amount due for this year, based on the time left, and automatically charge that to your account. 

Your new subscription total will then become **{{ total }} plus VAT per year**. **Would you like to continue?**
SETTINGS.msgChangePlanToMonthly:
You are currently on the **{{ plan }}** which renews every year. If you want to switch to a monthly subscription, then please contact accounts@restaurantcollective.org.uk.

Thank you.
SETTINGS.msgChangePlanToYearly:
You are currently subscribed to **{{ plan }}**. If you would prefer to save some money by switching to a yearly plan then please contact accounts@restaurantcollective.org.uk.

Many thanks.

SETTINGS.msgNewRequestReceived: New request successfully received. Thank you.

SIGNIN.errorUserUnauthorised: Unauthorised login attempt - please check your details
SIGNIN.introduction:
# Websites Made Simple

It’s time someone levelled the playing field for independent operators like you.

Welcome to **{{ brand }}**. We’re a member-owned, non-profit organisation on a mission.
We want to empower and champion independent hospitality operators.
SIGNIN.msgNewMember:
We have sent you a **welcome email** that you should receive in the next couple of minutes – if you don't receive it at first, check your email 'spam', just in case. 

The email includes a system generated password which you'll need to login for the first time:
  
- **Copy the password** & return to this page
- Close this message window by clicking 'OK'
- Paste your password into the form and **Sign In**  

**Thanks for joining us.**
SIGNIN.newPwdSent: A new password has been sent to your email address
SIGNIN.resetPwdInstructions: Enter your registered email address to reset your password. You may need to check your spam folder.

VERIFY.infoCode:
Please check the email address for **{{ name }}** and add your Verification Code below.

If you don't have a code yet, then make sure we have the correct email and use **Request Code option**.

Copy the code from your email and paste it back here.
VERIFY.infoEmail:
Please provide the main email address for {{ name }}.

This will be used to confirm Membership and in all future correspondence.
VERIFY.infoEmailAndCode:
Please enter the main email address for **{{ name }}** and then add your **Verification Code** below:.

If you don't have a code yet then once you've added the email address, use the **Request Code** option.

Copy the code from your email and paste it back here.
VERIFY.infoVerify:
Please check that the email address below is correct for **{{ name }}**, then add and submit your **verification code**.

If you don't have a code yet, first make sure that the email is correct, then select the **Request Code** option below and a code will be sent to you.

Once you have your code, return here and complete the process.
VERIFY.msgCodeSent: A verification code has been sent to {{ email }}
